title: Date of the contract

title: Specified transaction scope
explanation: The text states that 'Specified Transaction' will have the meaning specified in Section 14, indicating the standard definition is used.

title: Cross default applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the Cross-Default provisions will apply to Party A and will apply to Party B, indicating both parties are covered.

title: Specified indebtness includes borrowed_money
explanation: The text does not explicitly mention whether 'borrowed money' is included in Specified Indebtedness; it only specifies certain exclusions.

title: Specified indebtness excludes deposits
explanation: The text explicitly states that Specified Indebtedness shall not include obligations in respect of deposits received in the ordinary course of a party's banking business.

title: amount for Party A
explanation: No fixed amount is specified for Party A; only a percentage is given.

explanation: The text states 'an amount equal to three percent (3%) of Party A's shareholders' equity'.
